title: 22. Why Cities Rock
description: Could it be that cities are "our greatest invention" -- that, despite a reputation as black-soot-spewing engines of doom, they in fact make us richer, smarter, happier and (believe it!) greener?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
